install.name: S5 Frontpage Slide
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will display up to 10 Joomla modules in a Carousel style slide.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: Enter any pre-text message.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: s5_buttoncolumnwidth
param.label: Button column width
param.description: Enter in pixels how wide you want the left column to be

param.name: s5_width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the S5 Front Slide.

param.name: s5_height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height of the S5 Front Slide.

param.name: s5_buttonheight
param.label: Height of Buttons
param.description: Enter the height for the buttons.

param.name: s5_lineheight
param.label: Line-height of Buttons
param.description: Enter the height for the buttons to align them properly.

param.name: s5_buttoncolor
param.label: Color used for button background
param.description: Enter a HEX color for the button background, enter 'transparent' for no color

param.name: s5_buttonimage
param.label: Image used for button background
param.description: Enter the URL for an image you would like to show for the buttons.

param.name: s5_hovercolor
param.label: Color that shows on button hover
param.description: Enter a HEX color for the button background on hover, enter 'transparent' for no color

param.name: s5_hoverimage
param.label: Image that shows on button hover
param.description: Enter the URL for an image you would like to show on button hover.

param.name: s5_fontcolor
param.label: Color of Button Text
param.description: Enter a HEX color for the button font color

param.name: s5_shadows
param.label: Enable or disable the module shadows

param.name: s5_aligncolumn
param.label: Select on which side you would like the buttons to show

param.name: s5_javascript
param.label: Choose your javascript library.
param.description: We provide our own javascript S5 effects in case your template already uses a version of mootools that conflicts with this module.

param.name: s5_mootoolsmouse
param.label: Choose your button activation method
param.description: Select either mouse over or click to configure what method your modules appear with

param.name: s5_effectsani
param.label: Choose your animation effect
param.description: Select either fade in or snap in to configure what method your modules appear with

param.name: s5_effectmouse
param.label: Choose your button activation method
param.description: Select either mouse over or click to configure what method your modules appear with

param.default: You may add up to 10 module positions. Nothing will show unless the module is published to one of the s5_fs_x positions.
